programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Flagg and Bobby work together on their first co-list; Flagg gets emotional during the wedding rehearsal dinner; Tracy's ex-client comes crawling back; Josh Altman faces a tough deadline to sell a tear-down on the Riviera Golf Course.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: The Brits host a luxurious open house for their $45 million Bel Air listing; sparks fly when Flagg and Altman come face to face; Madison gets creative in selling a Malibu country home; Flagg and Bobby tie the knot in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Flagg may have promised more than he can deliver on a Beverly Hills estate; James and David are forced to come to terms with the state of the Los Angeles market; Josh Altman finds himself under attack during the launch of his newest listing.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: After the sale of Rose McGowan's home, Tracy holds an estate sale of all of the actress's belongings and memorabilia to help her continue to fight the good fight; Josh Flagg's patience grows thin as a result of his sellers' unrealistic expectations.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Flagg pulls out his bag of tricks in a final attempt to sell the Bel Air house; James and David's hot new listing attracts attention; Josh Altman lists the former Hollywood compound of a mega star only to be blind-sided by its new owner.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: After things get heated with a seller, Josh Altman finds himself working under new perimeters; James and David go all out to get the listing of a coveted, ultra-modern home; Altman and Flagg air their issues at James and David's open house.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Shamed by the drama that broke out at their brokers' open, James and David try to salvage their relationship with the sellers; Tracy tries to find a home for her friend; Flagg creates a hilarious short film to help market an ultra-modern listing.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: In an attempt to sell her Del Mar listing, Tracy heads to the racetrack in search of wealthy buyers; Josh Altman faces wife Heather when trying to sell a problematic listing; Josh Flagg bakes up a plan to get back on James and David's good side.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Josh Altman goes full hipster in his last ditch effort to sell an architectural wonder in a trendy Venice neighborhood; Tracy takes over a stale listing in Brentwood and attempts to revive the grandeur of the historic Georgian estate.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Michael tasks James and brother David with finding him a development opportunity, leading to a visit to the house where the movie, "Mommie Dearest," was filmed; Josh Flagg battles his control issues while teaming up with Bobby.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: In an attempt to sell a villa that has sat on the market for a year, Josh Altman rents a dunk tank to entice buyers; James and David enter heated negotiations involving the Playboy Bunny Ranch and the "Mommie Dearest" house.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James works hard to sell a home to singer Kelly Rowland; Josh Flagg gets creative to sell a Bel Air pad built for guitarist Robby Krieger; Tracy lands a shot at representing a billion-dollar development in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Tracy travels to Dubai, United Arab Emirates, to earn a listing that could change her life; she hangs out with Caroline Stanbury; Altman hunts down a mystery property in Malibu to house luxury cars; Flagg and Bobby embark on the ultimate house hunt.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James and David throw a Great Gatsby-themed open house in an effort to sell a Bel Air estate; Tracy launches her Dubai high-rise to a crowd in Los Angeles; Flagg and Altman try to work together to secure the most sought after listing in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sworn enemies Altman and Flagg team up in hopes of landing a major listing in La Jolla; Tracy gets creative to sell a Hollywood Hills artists enclave; James and David hit the hiking trails of LA to garner interest in a historic bungalow.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Flagg and Altman launch their La Jolla co-list with a black tie affair, but the event turns sour with some real estate drama between Tracy and the Brits.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Altman hosts a rockin' open house for a party pad that once belonged to Howard Hughes; Flagg tries to find the perfect family house for a very particular buyer; James and David look to expand their territory.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Altman hunts for his own flagship office space to create some distance from Fredrik Eklund, a former friend who is trying to make his mark on both coasts; Flagg tries to convince his hesitant seller to put in an offer or lose the home forever.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Tracy tries to balance her new portfolio with her demanding developer, who has high expectations, and a rocky past with Altman; James and David are up against the clock to find a pregnant client her dream home before she goes into labor.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Altman struggles to retain an unrealistic seller; Tracy tries to attract interest for a new construction with mid-century bones; Flagg's resort-style trophy listing proves more challenging than expected.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James and David host a backyard barbeque for their new family-oriented estate; Altman goes after a new modern home in his Bird Streets territory; Flagg tries to find a dream home in historic Hollywood Hills for actress Becca Tobin ("Glee").

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James and David experience difficulties with their Santa Monica gem, as the sellers have their own ideas about price and who the buyers should be.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: James and David work with a long-time client Zach Vella to list an architectural gem, but Fredrik's arrival in Los Angeles is putting the pressure on them to get it sold.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Altman lists a castle in Beverly Ridge; Flagg finds himself opposite Fredrik, trying to negotiate a deal while getting a fair price for his client; James and David are under pressure to get their latest Zach Vella listing sold.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Altman throws an epic launch event for a modern with a $48 million price tag and a social media twist; Tracy gets creative to find a buyer for her new WeHo modern; Los Angeles wildfires have a devastating impact on the market.

programme.title: Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles
programme.desc: Altman and Tracy co-list a historic Hollywood estate previously owned by Hollywood legend John Barrymore; James and David go all-in on their new East Coast traditional.
